inputs.name: From
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source location from where to copy files from. This will also include files in subdirectories. You can use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) , example: $(Agent.BuildDirectory)

inputs.name: To
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Destination location where to copy files to. If the directory doesn't exist yet, it will be created (if possible). You can use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) , example: $(Agent.BuildDirectory)

inputs.name: Filter
inputs.label: Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filename filter with wildcards. Any files not matching this filter will be excluded from the copy process. Empty will copy all files.

inputs.name: Purge
inputs.label: Clean target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will delete files and directories from the destination that do not exist in the source (Note: Will however not delete files or directories that exist in source and destination and just wouldn't be copied due to the filter criteria, except if Flatten switch is set)

inputs.name: Flatten
inputs.label: Flatten structure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will flatten directory structure (will not use robocopy, parameters Threads and IncludeEmpty will not have any effect)

inputs.name: IncludeEmpty
inputs.label: Include empty folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will also copy empty subdirectories (or subdirectories that would be empty because no file in the subdirectory of the source matches the filter) Will not have any effect if Flatten switch is present/set. (non-robocopy mode)

inputs.name: Overwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite target files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will only have an effect if -Flatten switch is present/set or a user is provided (non-robocopy mode)

inputs.name: Retries
inputs.label: Number of retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: How often should the copying of a file be retried if it failed? Use only numbers. Default is 10.

inputs.name: SecondsToRetry
inputs.label: Seconds to next retry
inputs.helpMarkDown: How long should the process wait before retrying to copy a file (in seconds)? Use only numbers. Default is 30.

inputs.name: Threads
inputs.label: Number of threads
inputs.helpMarkDown: How many threads should be used to copy the files? Use only numbers. Default is 10. Will not have any effect if Flatten switch is present/set. (non-robocopy mode)

inputs.name: PowershellCore
inputs.label: Use Powershell Core
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should Powershell Core be used if it exists?

inputs.name: User
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to use for destination credentials

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to use for destination credentials
